comments: Number of 10-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 3 contiguous pairs.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,-28,56,-70,56,-28,8,-1).
formula: G.f.: 5*(4+3x)*x^3/(1-x)^8.a(n) = C(n+1, 4)*C(n+3, 3) - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 10 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 16 2016
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
